snippet.title: LITTLE HELLIONS - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Swap places at “inconvenient” moments and torment your friends for funsies in the 4 player fighting game where you can't fight!

In the Underworld, the only way to light the eternal dark is by harnessing “torment energy” created from deadly pranks and mischief. In Little Hellions, players join an impish group of underworlder pals as they work and play to smash their daily torment quotas. Employ buzz saws, crushing machines and other infernal devices on a mad romp around the wonderland of sin and slapstick gags that is the Underworld! 

FRIENDSHIP (HURTS)
 #LittleHellions #Schadenfreude #Six66
